title: mitopy-nf pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline performs mitochondrial variant discovery and analysis built upon GATK best practices.

alignments.description: Path to the directory containing alignment files. Ex: path/to/bams/*.{bam,bai}

mt_reference.description: Mitochondrial reference genome. Currently, rCRS and RSRS references are supported

reference_fa.description: Path to reference genome FASTA. Only required if input alignments are in CRAM format.
